Package com.hazelcast.client.impl

Contains most of the client side HazelcastInstance implementation functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientConnectionManagerFactory  
    ClientMessageDecoder
    Interface to pass specific decode methods to generic data structures that is dealing with client message
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddInterceptorOperationSupplier  
    ClientDataSerializerHook  
    ClientDynamicClusterConfig
    Client implementation of member side config.
    ClientEndpointImpl
    The ClientEndpoint and Client implementation.
    ClientEndpointManagerImpl
    Manages and stores ClientEndpointImpls.
    ClientEngineImpl
    Class that requests, listeners from client handled in node side.
    ClientHeartbeatMonitor
    Monitors client heartbeats..
    ClientICacheManager
    Hazelcast instance cache manager provides a means to obtain JCache caches via HazelcastInstance API.
    ClientImpl
    Default Client implementation.
    ClientLockReferenceIdGenerator
    This class generates unique (per client) incrementing reference ID which is used during locking related requests.
    ClientLoggingService  
    ClientPartitionListenerService  
    ClientServiceProxy
    The default implementation of the ClientService.
    CollectRemoteTransactionsOperationSupplier  
    CompositeMessageTaskFactory  
    DefaultClientConnectionManagerFactory  
    DefaultClientExtension  
    HazelcastClientInstanceImpl  
    HazelcastClientProxy
    A client-side proxy HazelcastInstance instance.
    LifecycleServiceImpl
    Default LifecycleService implementation for the client.
    MemberImpl
    Client side specific Member implementation.
    ReAuthenticationOperationSupplier  
    RemoveInterceptorOperationSupplier  

Package com.hazelcast.client.impl Description

Contains most of the client side HazelcastInstance implementation functionality.
